title: Handle a Lost Shipment Inquiry
description: A customer calls because their tracking information has not updated in several days, and they believe the shipment is lost.

tasks.description: Retrieve the shipment's tracking history from the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the tracking has not updated in 5 days.

tasks.description: Initiate a 'tracer' request with the carrier to have them search for the package in their network.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully files a tracer request with the carrier.

tasks.description: After 48 hours, the carrier confirms the package is lost. File a 'lost in transit' claim with the carrier.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent files a claim for the value of the goods.

tasks.description: Ship a replacement order to the customer free of charge.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent resolves the issue for the customer by sending a new shipment.
